title: Project Structure Validator with Guidelines
goal: Validate project folder structure based on project-specific rules defined in `guidelines.json` and file content.
prompt: Scan the project under `{root_folder}`. Automatic Preprocessing: 1. Extract the full directory tree to build `{project_structure}`. 2. Read partial contents of each file to build `{file_contents}`. 3. Read project rules and folder mapping from `{root_folder}/guidelines.json`. Validation Rules: 1. Ensure each file is located in the folder as defined by the rules in `guidelines.json`. 2. Identify misplaced files with reasoning. 3. Suggest the correct folder placement without modifying any files.
